constraints.name: interval_sum_leq_k
constraints.description: 区间内元素和不超过 K

constraints.name: non_negative_interval
constraints.description: 区间端点非负且左端点不大于右端点

constraints.name: no_solution_output
constraints.description: 若无满足条件的区间，输出 -1
constraints.formal: if no (l, r) satisfies the conditions, output -1
